channel.title: Headcrab achievement
channel.description:
Just making my way back to reception area after picking up the suite / trigger event, noticed in the microwave a stuck head crab & thought this would make an easy achievement.
Label: Microwave a head crab Completion criteria: microwave the head crab in break room (the one that's near to suite pick-up room
Also how about one for getting the guard you meet on way back (armed with a pistol) alive to the reception area so he can try & call for help

item.title: Headcrab achievement
item.dc:creator: DreamSphinx
item.description:
Dr. Karamazov:

If it’s really easy it can hardly be considered an achievement.

Yeah, but almost half of the achievements were related to dying a certain way lol. I’d say dying is pretty easy.

Read full topic
